text:
THE UNIVERSITY OF NEBRASKA
LINCOLN S, NEBRASKA
UNIVERSITY TELEVISION
1959
Dr, Harry J. Skornia
Executive Director
National Association of
Educational Broadcasters
II4. Gregory Hall
Urbana, Illinois
Mr, William G, Harley
President, National Association
of Educational Broadcasters
Station WHA-TV
Madison, Wisconsin
Gentlemen:
On rechecking correspondence, I am embarrassed
to say that in my invitation of October 1 to you to
represent NAEB at our Fifth Anniversary celebration,
we have asked you here on November 2. Tuesday falls
on November 3, however, instead of November 2, We
plan to tape a special program at L|.500 p.m., Tuesday,
November 3, and a banquet at 6:30 p.m. will follow.
I know both of your schedules are crowded. Iâ€™ll
just cross my fingers and hope I can discuss this with
you both at Detroit.
Sincerely,
Jack McBride
Director of Television
and KUON-TV
JMcB:ss
